column4: quick question- i'm wondering which type of ubuntu to download (standard personal computer, 64 bit AMD and Intel, of Sun UltraSPARC based). I have a white 2GHz early 2006 macBook. specs are at http://support.apple.com/specs/macbook/macbook.html
any help would be greatly appreciated. thanks!
afaik you cant use stuff like flash/java in the 64bit ubuntu
